::Fenox::

Fenox smiled, looking at D as he relaxed from her scratching. She 
made a mental note not to be so snappy next time.

"There you go," she said in a friendly tone, "Thanks for warning me 
about him. It was a possibility that I might not have known."

She looked up at him as he moved back and stood up, a bit surprised 
at how tall he was now. Fenox smiled.

"I'm always careful," she said, giving him a small pat on his side 
and then walking out the door. She walked up to Vlad.

"I'm sorry about that," she said to him, "He got a bit worked up 
about something."





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * D was glad the Fenox knew to look out for Vlad, it was a relief.
> He was starting to feel better and not feel too bad about her tone 
of voice, 
> his ears moving in different directions now and they weren't flat 
against 
> his head.
> But he relaxed when she scratched behind his ears, thinking that it 
felt 
> close to heaven. And it did.
> He leaned against her a bit, just liking the feeling.
> He remembered that the people who he grew up with did this too, but 
they 
> were a bit far in his mind and he was gunna dwell on the scratching 
for now.
> D let out a deep sigh and then shock himself, stepping back a bit 
before 
> rising onto his hind legs (looks like a warewolf.) He looked down 
at Fenox, 
> who was now shorter then his shoulders but taller then his waist.*
> 
> " Be careful."
> 
> * He said in his smoth voice, then looking at the door to the room. 
A sign 
> that it was time Fenox left and checked up on Vlad. God knew what 
he was up 
> to out there.*
> 
>
